attributes.action: Ban Extremist Right Parties and Organisations
attributes.additional_details:
Extremist parties and Organisations should face immediate closure through a fair and democratic vote in parliament. Groups such as the BNP, NF and the EDL threaten British culture and British values by spreading lies and deceit. Using events such as the 7/7 bombings to spread racial hatred can not be tolerated.

We should be proud to live in a country where we celebrate our cultural diversity and we should not let racist organisations such as the BNP, EDL and NF threaten this!

BAN THEM!!!
